nodes.text: "The Second Chance" (German title "Eine Zweite Chance") is a comic strip written by Martin Fisher, drawn by Ruairí Coleman and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 24th issue of the German Star Wars Rebels Magazine, which was released on October 26, 2016.
Star Wars Rebels Magazin #24: Eine Zweite Chance on Jedi-Bibliothek.de
